Tag 1: Membrane system and methodology checked off against ALAND standard details and MSDS and guidelines

Name: Surface Preparation as per Application Guide
Tag 1: Surface Preparation as per Application Guide

Name: Substrate clean, dry & free from dust
Tag 1: Substrate clean, dry and free from dust.

Name: Substrate structurally sound & ready to receive membrane
Tag 1: Ensure substrate is structurally sound and ready to receive membrane

Name: Humidity/temp./moist. in accordance with recs. prior to primer
Tag 1: Ensure Humidity, temperature and moisture are in accordance with manufacturer's recommendations prior to primer - Add photos & have signed by Aland

Name: Primer to all surfaces at a rate of 3-4m2/Ltr
Tag 1: Primer to all surfaces at a rate of 3-4m2/Ltr -Alternative primers - at a rate of 5-8 m2/Ltr

Name: Floor wastes & pipes primed in accordance with recs.
Tag 1: Ensure all floor wastes and pipes have been primed in accordance with manufacturer's recommendations

Name: Corners/joints/gaps/cracks treated with polyurethane sealant
Tag 1: All corners, joints, gaps and cracks to be treated with a flexible polyurethane sealant HydraFlex.

Name: Humidity/temp./moist. in accordance with recs. prior to 1st coat
Tag 1: Ensure Humidity, temperature and moisture are in accordance with manufacturer's recommendations prior to first coat

Name: 1st coat of selected Membrane to entire areas as per Australian Std.
Tag 1: First coat of selected Membrane to entire areas as per Australian Standard

Name: Humidity/temp./moist. in accordance with recs. prior to 2nd coat
Tag 1: Ensure Humidity, temperature and moisture are in accordance with manufacturer's recommendations prior to second coat

Name: 2nd coat of selected Membrane to entire areas as per POLYBIT recs.
Tag 1: Second coat of selected Membrane to entire areas as per POLYBIT recommendations: Note - a total dry film thickness of 1.2mm (1200 microns) in two finished coats. As such at min. Wet Film Thickness of 0.75mm per coat is required - Apply membrane at a coverage of 0.75 - 1 Ltr / m2 per coat

Name: Humidity/temp./moist. in accordance with recs. prior to final coat
Tag 1: Ensure Humidity, temperature and moisture are in accordance with manufacturer's recommendations prior to final coat

Name: Apply final coat of top coat at a coverage rate of 3 - 4 m2/ltr
Tag 1: Apply final coat of top coat at a coverage rate of 3 - 4 m2/ltr

Name: Dry film thickness test using Positector coating instrument
Tag 1: Carry out dry film thickness test using Positector coating thickness inspection instrument and record thickness reading

Name: Ensure all work is completed as per ITP
Tag 1: Ensure all work is completed as per ITP

Tag 1: Shower & door angle in correct position and level. Angles to be 1.6mm gauge aluminium

Tag 1: All corners have polyurethane bond breaker (Hydraflex) installed with min 12mm radios

Name: Waterproof walls of shower/vanity section up to 1.8m/ceiling
Tag 1: Waterproof walls of shower and vanity section up to 1.8m/ceiling. Seal taps and the like. 2x coats required.

Tag 1: Min 50mm past shower screen has been waterproofed

Tag 1: Allow curing in accordance with manufacturers specification 24-48 hours min

Tag 1: Carry out dry film thickness test using Positector coating thickness inspection instrument - a total dry film thickness of 1.2mm (1200 microns) in two finished coats.
